## ValidationOptions.validateContentData property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The flag that incicates whether content data should be validated at all. When this is `false`<!-- -->, then all content data validations will be skipped.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get validateContentData(): boolean;

set validateContentData(value: boolean);
```
